channel.title: Science help?
channel.description:
any one know anything about newtons? if you do could you help me?
i have to finish these questions and i think there unnecessary and stupid but...
1. a force of 1000N (newtons) is applied to push a mass of 500kg how quickly does it accelerate?
2. a force of 3000N on a car to make it accelerate by 15m/s how heavy is the car?
3. a car accelerates at a rate of 5m/s. if it weighs 500kg how much driving force is the engine applying?
post a comment on this homework or at least an answer or two because this is just baffling
[hr]
finished

item.title: Science help?
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“Hex Key, post:3, topic:60883”]F=ma
Force= mass X Acceleration

Just plug in what you know. anything in Newtons is a force, anyhting in m/s/s is an acceleration, anythign in kg is a mass.

  1. 2m/s/s
    2)200kg
    3)2500N[/quote]

Smart and sexy… how much more could a man want?

Read full topic
